Author: damnitjanet6
Text: Safe food like it was one of the first “real meals” I had after having a really bad ED phase, and then I started eating it every day for ages and quite often it’s the only breakfast food I can bring myself to eat. I haven’t actually tried that, but I do have a packet in my cupboard from back when I was vegan so I might have a go, thank you ♥️ I’m just all panicky about the entire concept right now 😅

Author: juneispridemoth
Text: is it safe food calorie wise or like arfid (taste/texture/color etc)? I've always been allergic to eggs so I've never eaten many but from what I've heard the justegg vegan egg replacer tastes just like scrambled eggs. I have a huge meat phobia cause of my arfid so I wont even fake meat but if this isnt the case for you I reccomend looking into it. please stay safe friend <3
